events.name: Stanford Cardinal at Michigan State Spartans

notes.headline: ROSE BOWL GAME PRESENTED BY VIZIO

headlines.description: Connor Cook passed for a career-high 332 yards and hit Tony Lippett with a tiebreaking 25-yard touchdown pass early in the fourth quarter, leading No. 4 Michigan State to a 24-20 victory over No. 5 Stanford on Wednesday night in the 100th Rose Bowl.

Blake Bortles threw for 301 yards and accounted for four touchdowns, and No. 15 Central Florida pulled off one of the biggest upsets of the bowl season by outlasting No. 6 Baylor 52-42 in the Fiesta Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bortles, UCF upend Baylor in Fiesta

events.name: Wisconsin Badgers at South Carolina Gamecocks

headlines.description: Connor Shaw was responsible for five touchdowns, including three passing, and South Carolina (No. 9 BCS, No. 8 AP) outlasted No. 19 Wisconsin 34-24 in the Capital One Bowl on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Shaw, S.C. too much for Badgers

headlines.description: Hill runs for 216 yards, LSU beats Iowa 21-14
headlines.shortLinkText: Hill rushes for 216 as LSU holds on

headlines.description: Nebraska beats No. 23 Georgia 24-19 in Gator Bowl

events.name: UNLV Rebels at North Texas Mean Green

notes.headline: HEART OF DALLAS BOWL - PRES. BY PLAINSCAPITAL BANK

headlines.description: North Texas tops UNLV 36-14 in Heart of Dallas
headlines.shortLinkText: Thompson, UNT erupt in 2nd half vs. UNLV
